text: Esterháza is a palace in Fertőd, Hungary. It was built by Prince Nikolaus Esterházy. It is called "Hungary's Versailles". Joseph Haydn worked and performed concerts in the palace. He wrote and performed symphonies and operas.Robbins Landon, H. C. and David Wyn Jones (1988). Haydn: His Life and Music.
